Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CHTMLEntryDisplay::CHTMLEntryDisplay ( )

The constructor of CHTMLEntryDisplay.

This is the constructor of CHTMLEntryDisplay. It initializes the members and creates the objects we need to create the required HTML formatted text.

Member Function Documentation

char CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display ( CSwordModuleInfo * module ) [virtual]

Renders the current entry of the module using HTML tags.

The rendered text is cached so it's faster if it's called for the same key next time.

Reimplemented in CHTMLChapterDisplay.
